text: Fred Berthold (December 9, 1922 – September 18, 2019) was an American theologian, currently the Preston Kelsey Professor of Religion, Emeritus, at Dartmouth College, in Hanover, New Hampshire. ==References== Category:1922 births Category:2019 deaths Category:American theologians Category:Dartmouth College alumni Category:Dartmouth College faculty Category:People from Webster Groves, Missouri Category:University of Chicago alumni
title: Fred Berthold
